verbs.description: [ARG1: Ivanka Trump] [V: sat] down [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG2: with South Korea 's foreign minister] [ARGM-PRP: for a meeting whose purpose remains a mystery] .
Ivanka Trump sat down Thursday with South Korea 's foreign minister for [ARG1: a meeting] [R-ARG1: whose purpose] [V: remains] [ARG3: a mystery] .
